Plot: Bob Preston, publicity man for Superba Pictures, uses his publicity skills in an attempt to make this fiancée June Dale the most famous movie star in the world. But in doing so, he forgets ...
Title: Young and Beautiful
Writer: Joseph Santley (story), Milton Krims (story), Dore Schary (screenplay), Al Martin (screenplay), Colbert Clark (screenplay)
Actors: William Haines, Judith Allen, Joseph Cawthorn, John Miljan
